meanings.definition: A region or part of a town, a country, or the world.
meanings.sent1: The rural areas are filled with farms and open fields.
meanings.sent2: Exploring new areas while on vacation is always exciting.
meanings.sent3: The areas around the park were so quiet, even the birds seemed to whisper.
meanings.sent4: Her mind wandered to distant areas of imagination, where anything was possible.
meanings.sent5: The areas of the map marked 'uncharted' intrigued the adventurous explorer.

meanings.definition: A space within a building or other enclosed space.
meanings.sent1: The storage areas in the basement were overflowing with old boxes.
meanings.sent2: The seating areas in the restaurant were cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent3: The playroom was transformed into a magical area where toys came to life at night.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like an empty area, waiting to be filled with love and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The dark area under the stairs gave her the creeps, as if something lurked there.

meanings.definition: A subject or range of activity or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: Mathematics and science are two areas she excels in at school.
meanings.sent2: The areas of expertise required for the job were diverse and challenging.
meanings.sent3: His knowledge in the area of ancient history was so vast, he could teach a class on it.
meanings.sent4: In the area of creativity, she was a true master, always coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The area of music theory opened up a whole new world of understanding for her.
